Text: O̩la Jihofa ki wʼugbo Ze̩fanaya, o̩ma Kushai, o̩ma Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Amaraya, o̩ma He̩zakaya, iko Josaya, o̩ma Amo̩n, onu Juda.
kpʼabo ku ma dojikane̩ ñw uwewe e̩wñ ojale ojokunyi;
kpʼabo ku ma muna ubi bʼiJihofa ubi te̩,
Chechi eju Ondu Jihofa ki dane̩!
I la awa tu o̩jo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa le̩—
O̩jo̩ le̩ omi la awa bʼudu
Me̩ kwa, ame̩ ku me̩ dodo Agu!
Iko le̩ omi anʼagege atejane̩ efu Je̩rusale̩m,
